sections.description: Custom utility plugin for Vizu Disain websites. Contains useful shortcodes, Elementor tweaks, and other common functionality.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Added `[vizu_hello]` shortcode for testing.
  • Improved updater initialization.

1.0.1 - Initial Release

  • Added automatic update functionality.
  • Set up GitHub repository for version control.
